titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Vassar College Vietnam Era Protests Collection, 1962-1972
titlestmt.author: Inventory prepared by Laura Streett

publicationstmt.publisher: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Laura Streett, 2015

did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Vassar College Vietnam Era Protests Collection

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

did.abstract: An artificial collection of clippings, leaflets, and correspondence related to campus protests at Vassar College during the height of the Vietnam War.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: An artificial collection of clippings, leaflets, and correspondence related to campus protest at Vassar College during the height of the Vietnam War.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research according to the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library without any additional restrictions.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to quote (publish) from unpublished or previously published material must be obtained as described in the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library.

p.archref: Digitized newspapers in the Vassar College Digital Library

odd.head: Encoding Information
odd.p: Encoded by Laura Streett, January 2015. Updated by Emma Gronbeck, June 2023.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Presumably gathered by Vassar librarians from administrative offices and publications.
Additional materials were the gift of Judith Schwartz (VC 1964), 2023. [A2023-016]

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Vassar College Vietnam Era Protests Collection, Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries.

did.unittitle: General Materials on Vassar and Vietnam
"Southeast Asia: An American Crisis - A Study Compiled by the Vassar Strike Research Committee,"
Materials on Strikes and Protests concerning Vietnam,
Vassar College Administrative Materials on Vietnam
Vassar Committee to end the War in Vietnam
